title: Reading Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance - Chapter 9
description:
#zen_and_the_art_of_motorcycle_maintenance #robert_pirsig #logic
Day 4 still in Montana, the ​dynamic between dualities, 2 kinds of logic, science and the art of the motorcycle mechanic...with snacks!
